mapper.select: SELECT o.order_date AS order_date,COUNT(o.order_num) AS order_num,SUM(o.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,SUM(o.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order AS o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.status = 3 GROUP BY o.order_date -- ORDER BY o.tax_amount ASC

SELECT date_format(o.order_date,'%Y-%m') AS order_date, COUNT(o.order_num) AS order_num,SUM(o.tax_amount) AS tax_amount, SUM(o.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order AS o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.status = 3 GROUP BY date_format(o.order_date,'%Y-%m') -- ORDER BY SUM(o.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(o.order_date),'年',quarter(o.order_date),'季度') AS order_date,SUM(o.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,SUM(o.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order AS o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.status = 3 GROUP BY CONCAT(YEAR(o.order_date),'年',quarter(o.order_date),'季度') -- ORDER BY SUM(o.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT case when month(o.order_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'上半年') when month(o.order_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'下半年') else null end AS order_date, SUM(o.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,SUM(o.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order AS o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.status = 3 GROUP BY case when month(o.order_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'上半年') when month(o.order_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'下半年') else null end -- ORDER BY SUM(o.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT year(o.order_date) AS order_date,COUNT(o.order_num) AS order_num,SUM(o.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,SUM(o.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order AS o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.status = 3 GROUP BY year(o.order_date) -- ORDER BY SUM(o.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT b.name AS name,count(o.order_num) AS order_num,sum(o.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,sum(o.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order o LEFT JOIN base_area b ON o.area_id=b.id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.status = 3 GROUP BY b.name ORDER BY SUM(o.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT t2.name AS name,count(t1.order_num) AS order_num,sum(t1.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,sum(t1.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order t1 LEFT JOIN base_person t2 ON t1.person_sales_id=t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.status = 3 GROUP BY t2.name ORDER BY sum(t1.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT t2.name AS name,date_format(t1.order_date,'%Y-%m') as order_date, count(t1.order_num) AS order_num,sum(t1.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,sum(t1.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order t1 LEFT JOIN base_person t2 ON t1.person_sales_id=t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.status = 3 GROUP BY t2.name,date_format(t1.order_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY sum(t1.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT t2.name AS name, CONCAT(YEAR(t1.order_date),'年',quarter(t1.order_date),'季度') as order_date, count(t1.order_num) AS order_num,sum(t1.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,sum(t1.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order t1 LEFT JOIN base_person t2 ON t1.person_sales_id=t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.status = 3 GROUP BY t2.name, CONCAT(YEAR(t1.order_date),'年',quarter(t1.order_date),'季度') ORDER BY sum(t1.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT t2.name AS name,year(t1.order_date) as order_date, count(t1.order_num) AS order_num,sum(t1.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,sum(t1.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order t1 LEFT JOIN base_person t2 ON t1.person_sales_id=t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.status = 3 GROUP BY t2.name,year(t1.order_date) ORDER BY sum(t1.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT t2.name AS name, t2.custom_type AS custom_type,count(order_num) AS order_num,sum(tax_amount) AS tax_amount,sum(tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order t1 LEFT JOIN base_custom t2 ON t1.custom_sign_id=t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND T1.status = 3 AND t2.custom_type = #{customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY t1.custom_sign_id ORDER BY sum(tax_amount) ASC

SELECT B.name AS name, date_format(o.order_date,'%Y-%m') AS order_date,COUNT(o.order_num) AS order_num,SUM(o.tax_amount) AS tax_amount,SUM(o.tax_free_amount) AS tax_free_amount FROM base_execute_order AS o LEFT JOIN base_area B ON o.area_id=B.id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.status > 0 AND o.status < 3
GROUP BY B.name
GROUP BY date_format(o.order_date,'%Y-%m')
ORDER BY SUM(o.tax_amount) ASC

SELECT date_format(t2.order_date,'%Y-%m') AS order_date,mt.name AS name,sum(t1.cpm) AS cpm_total,SUM(media_price*cpm) AS sale_amount,SUM(first_price*cpm) AS buy_amount FROM base_order_cpm t1 INNER JOIN base_buy_order t2 ON t1.order_id =t2.id LEFT JOIN base_media AS m ON t1.media_id = m.id LEFT JOIN base_media_type AS mt ON m.type = mt.id WHERE t1.order_cpm_type = 6 AND t2.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t2.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and t2.del_flag = 0 AND t2.item_status = 0 AND t2.status = 1 GROUP BY mt.name ,date_format(t2.order_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY #{orderKey} DESC;

SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(t2.order_date),'年',quarter(t2.order_date),'季度') AS order_date,mt.name AS type,sum(t1.cpm) AS cpm_total,SUM(media_price*cpm) AS sale_amount,SUM(first_price*cpm) AS buy_amount FROM base_order_cpm t1 INNER JOIN base_buy_order t2 ON t1.order_id =t2.id LEFT JOIN base_media AS m ON t1.media_id = m.id LEFT JOIN base_media_type AS mt ON m.type = mt.id WHERE t1.order_cpm_type = 6 AND t2.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t2.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and t2.del_flag = 0 AND t2.item_status = 0 AND t2.status = 1 GROUP BY mt.name , CONCAT(YEAR(t2.order_date),'年',quarter(t2.order_date),'季度') ORDER BY #{orderKey} DESC;

SELECT case when month(t2.order_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(t2.order_date),'上半年') when month(t2.order_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(t2.order_date),'下半年') else null end AS order_date,mt.name AS name,sum(t1.cpm) AS cpm_total,SUM(media_price*cpm) AS sale_amount,SUM(first_price*cpm) AS buy_amount FROM base_order_cpm t1 INNER JOIN base_buy_order t2 ON t1.order_id =t2.id LEFT JOIN base_media AS m ON t1.media_id = m.id LEFT JOIN base_media_type AS mt ON m.type = mt.id WHERE t1.order_cpm_type = 6 AND t2.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t2.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and t2.del_flag = 0 AND t2.item_status = 0 AND t2.status = 1 GROUP BY mt.name , case when month(t2.order_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(t2.order_date),'上半年') when month(t2.order_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(t2.order_date),'下半年') else null end ORDER BY #{orderKey} DESC;

SELECT year(t2.order_date) AS order_date,mt.name AS name,sum(t1.cpm) AS cpm_total,SUM(media_price*cpm) AS sale_amount,SUM(first_price*cpm) AS buy_amount FROM base_order_cpm t1 INNER JOIN base_buy_order t2 ON t1.order_id =t2.id LEFT JOIN base_media AS m ON t1.media_id = m.id LEFT JOIN base_media_type AS mt ON m.type = mt.id WHERE t1.order_cpm_type = 6 AND t2.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t2.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and t2.del_flag = 0 AND t2.item_status = 0 AND t2.status = 1 GROUP BY mt.name ,year(t2.order_date) ORDER BY #{orderKey} DESC;

SELECT m.name AS name,sum(t1.cpm) AS cpm_total,SUM(media_price*cpm) AS sale_amount,SUM(first_price*cpm) AS buy_amount FROM base_order_cpm t1 INNER JOIN base_buy_order t2 ON t1.order_id =t2.id LEFT JOIN base_media m ON t1.media_id=m.id WHERE t1.order_cpm_type = 6 AND t2.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t2.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t2.status = 1 GROUP BY m.name ORDER BY #{orderKey} DESC;

SELECT case when month(o.order_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'上半年') when month(o.order_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'下半年') else null end AS order_date , b.name AS name, count(o.order_num)/SUM(F.pay1) as yswc FROM base_execute_order o LEFT JOIN base_area_finance F ON o.area_id=F.area_id LEFT JOIN base_area b ON o.area_id=b.id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.status in (2,3) and f.del_flag = 0 AND f.item_status = 0 and o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY b.name, (case when month(o.order_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'上半年') when month(o.order_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(o.order_date),'下半年') else null end);

SELECT year(o.order_date) AS order_date ,b.name AS name,count(o.order_num)/SUM(F.pay1) as yswc FROM base_execute_order o LEFT JOIN base_area_finance F ON o.area_id=F.area_id LEFT JOIN base_area b ON o.area_id=b.id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.item_status = 0 AND o.status in (2,3) and f.del_flag = 0 AND f.item_status = 0 and o.order_date >= date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND o.order_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY b.name,year(o.order_date);

SELECT t1.custom_id AS custom_id , t2.name AS name, case when t2.custom_type='1' then '4A公司' when t2.custom_type='2' then '直客' when t2.custom_type='3' then '广告主（下拉）' else t2.custom_type end AS custom_type, SUM(t1.income-t1.cost_buy-t1.room_pay-t1.person_pay-t1.tax-t1.sales_commission-other_pay) AS J_PAY, SUM(income-cost_buy) AS M_PAY FROM base_custom_finance t1 INNER JOIN base_custom t2 ON t1.custom_id=t2.id WHERE t2.custom_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.start_date>=date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.end_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY t1.custom_id ORDER BY J_PAY DESC;

SELECT date_format(t1.start_date,'%Y-%m') start_date, t1.custom_id AS custom_id , t2.name AS name, case when t2.custom_type='1' then '4A公司' when t2.custom_type='2' then '直客' when t2.custom_type='3' then '广告主（下拉）' else t2.custom_type end AS custom_type, SUM(t1.income-t1.cost_buy-t1.room_pay-t1.person_pay-t1.tax-t1.sales_commission-other_pay) AS J_PAY, SUM(income-cost_buy) AS M_PAY FROM base_custom_finance t1 INNER JOIN base_custom t2 ON t1.custom_id=t2.id WHERE t2.custom_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.start_date>=date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.end_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY t1.custom_id ,date_format(t1.start_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY J_PAY DESC;

SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(t1.start_date),'年',quarter(t1.start_date),'季度') start_date, t1.custom_id AS custom_id , t2.name AS name, case when t2.custom_type='1' then '4A公司' when t2.custom_type='2' then '直客' when t2.custom_type='3' then '广告主（下拉）' else t2.custom_type end AS custom_type, SUM(t1.income-t1.cost_buy-t1.room_pay-t1.person_pay-t1.tax-t1.sales_commission-other_pay) AS J_PAY, SUM(income-cost_buy) AS M_PAY FROM base_custom_finance t1 INNER JOIN base_custom t2 ON t1.custom_id=t2.id WHERE t2.custom_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.start_date>=date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.end_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY t1.custom_id ,CONCAT(YEAR(t1.start_date),'年',quarter(t1.start_date),'季度') ORDER BY J_PAY DESC;

SELECT case when month(t1.start_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(t1.start_date),'上半年') when month(t1.start_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(t1.start_date),'下半年') else null end start_date, t1.custom_id AS custom_id , t2.name AS name, case when t2.custom_type='1' then '4A公司' when t2.custom_type='2' then '直客' when t2.custom_type='3' then '广告主（下拉）' else t2.custom_type end AS custom_type, SUM(t1.income-t1.cost_buy-t1.room_pay-t1.person_pay-t1.tax-t1.sales_commission-other_pay) AS J_PAY, SUM(income-cost_buy) AS M_PAY FROM base_custom_finance t1 INNER JOIN base_custom t2 ON t1.custom_id=t2.id WHERE t2.custom_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.start_date>=date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.end_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY t1.custom_id , case when month(t1.start_date) < 6 then CONCAT(year(t1.start_date),'上半年') when month(t1.start_date)>=6 then CONCAT(year(t1.start_date),'下半年') else null end ORDER BY J_PAY DESC;

SELECT year(t1.start_date) as start_date, t1.custom_id AS custom_id , t2.name AS name, case when t2.custom_type='1' then '4A公司' when t2.custom_type='2' then '直客' when t2.custom_type='3' then '广告主（下拉）' else t2.custom_type end AS custom_type, SUM(t1.income-t1.cost_buy-t1.room_pay-t1.person_pay-t1.tax-t1.sales_commission-other_pay) AS J_PAY, SUM(income-cost_buy) AS M_PAY FROM base_custom_finance t1 INNER JOIN base_custom t2 ON t1.custom_id=t2.id WHERE t2.custom_type = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0 AND t1.start_date>=date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND t1.end_date <= date(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) GROUP BY t1.custom_id ,year(t1.start_date) ORDER BY J_PAY DESC;

SELECT t1.custom_id AS custom_id,t1.name AS name,t2.pay_percent AS pay_percent FROM base_custom_finance t1 LEFT JOIN base_execute_order_frame t2 ON t1.custom_id=t2.custom_sign_id where t1.del_flag = 0 AND t1.item_status = 0
